Html:
Hi,

Is there a Unity version of StockTraderRI under Prism 5.0 anywhere, if not will the V2.2 work under 5?
Nope. RI was only built with MEF in 4.0, and there were significant refactorings across the app from the 2.2 version.
Ok thanks, but the concept of V2.2 as far as using Unity in 5.0 will work correct? I have it upgraded from VS2008 to 2015 running successfully.

Yes, of course. Unity is fully supported in Prism 5 (and Prism 6 which we expect to release next week for WPF and UWP - http://github.com/PrismLibrary/Prism). And I don't think we introduced any breaking changes in Prism 4 or 5 that would make the StockTrader code from Prism 2.2 stop working.

Thanks again! And I Just took a look at the examples of version 6 and it looks great! Will download it and do some poking around. I feel Windows 10 is the best OS yet.

This is awesome:
ViewModelLocationProvider.Register(typeof(MainPage).ToString(), () => new MainPageViewModel(_dataRepository, NavigationService));
